faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about digital reception

items.question: How long does installation take?
items.answer: Digital reception installation takes between 2-4 hours, depending on the complexity of integration with existing systems. Our team will ensure everything is set up and tested before we leave your location.

items.question: How much does digital reception cost?
items.answer: Digital reception pricing starts at €999 for the basic package which includes touchscreen kiosk, software, installation and training. We also offer monthly packages from €99/month. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your needs.

items.question: Does it integrate with PMS systems?
items.answer: Yes! Digital reception integrates with most popular PMS systems such as Opera, Cloudbeds, Mews, Protel and others. Our API enables seamless integration and synchronization of all data.

items.question: What if a guest needs help?
items.answer: The kiosk has an integrated video call that allows guests to connect directly with your staff or our 24/7 support. You can also place the kiosk near reception for added security.

items.question: Is the system secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! Digital reception is GDPR compliant, uses end-to-end encryption, and all data is stored on secure servers. It's integrated with the eTurista system for automatic guest registration.

items.question: What's the warranty?
items.answer: We offer 2 years warranty on all hardware and free software updates. Technical support is available 24/7 via phone, email or remote access.

items.question: Can I customize the appearance?
items.answer: Yes! You can fully customize colors, logo, language and kiosk interface to match your brand. We offer various themes and layout options.

items.question: How does payment work?
items.answer: The kiosk can be integrated with a POS terminal for card payments, or you can use an online payment gateway (Stripe, PayPal). Guests can pay by credit card, debit card or via mobile device.
